Ousai Private Academy, due to declining birth rates, has transitioned from an all-girls high school to a co-ed. The current ratio of male to female students is 28:524. In this \"paradise\", Tsuda Takatoshi is unceremoniously pushed into the job as vice-president of the student council. The student council has a very strict image. However, the female council members are less than orthodox...

Amakusa Shino, council president, is a stickler for rules, and likes to violently enforce them. Hagimura Suzu, the council treasurer is an excessively under-tall girl with an IQ of 180, who likes heights to be able to look down on others. And finally, Shichijou Aria, the council secretary, is a well-meaning airhead with a slightly perverted streak.","genres":["Comedy","Ecchi","Harem","Parody","Romance","School","Shoujo
